s: The EcoSphere is a completely closed, balanced, glass ecosystem. Inside each EcoSphere are shrimp, algae, and microorganisms in salt water. Because the EcoSphere contains everything it needs to thrive, you never have to feed the life within, or change the water.

s: I have had 4 of these. They are awsome. The longest I have been able to get my shrimp to live is about 5 years (that was with the first version of the EcoSphere. My current one started with 4 shrimp. Just a couple days ago after having it about 18 months, the first of the 4 shrimp died.
